functions.name: review_diff
functions.description: Review a unified diff and select hunks to apply or rework.

number.description: Index of the hunk in the diff. Starts from 1.

reason.description: Reason for applying or ignoring this hunk, or for asking for it to be reworked.

decision.description: Whether to apply this hunk, rework, or ignore it.

hunks.reason: The hunk correctly implements the MongoDB connection using Mongoose and dotenv as per the task instructions. It includes error handling and logs the connection status, aligning with best practices for database connectivity.

response.review_notes: The implementation follows the task instructions accurately, including proper use of async/await for the database connection, error handling, and environment variable usage for the MongoDB URI. Good job on following the best practices for a database connection setup in Node.js applications.
